title: How to score above 95% on class 9 CBSE - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: At this stage its easy… MOTIVATION: Just tell your mind this: The things you would learn in 11 and 12 will be around 100 times harder and that what you are learning today,nd at 11 you will say what a mess that you made to those easy concepts. PROJECTS: They are just timepass and decoration ,they dont seriously teach anything Adopt a standard decorative way to prepare a file and give files in that way to save time WAY TO DO A CHAPTER: Do a chapter casually as soon as the chapter is touched in class (i.e. pre-learning) Every sunday do a chapter by heart Take every test seriously Revise frequently ATTENTION IN CLASS: Attention in class is must in every way. CHAPTER AND SUBJECT COVERAGE: You will be able to score 95+ only if you master all chapters of all subjects. TIME TABLE: No need of a time table if you study every day for 2–5 hours at any part of day WAY TO DO A TOUGH CHAPTER/SUBJECT : You would have to give special attention to such a chapter/subject You would have to do a chapter with your mind open and learn methods that would make it easier. KEEP MIND FRESH AND DONT OVERSTUDY ….well 9th does not really meaning more than getting a name verification document ;finals report card

I guess I am very late to the game but I hope it helps someone out there. All you have to do is read your Ncert. Read it as many times as possible and only for solving questions you would want to use other books. Now don’t ask me what are the books. Ask your subject teachers, they will refer to a lot of books before teaching you and hence will know better.

Did you solve your textbook thoroughly? If yes, than go for mock papers of oswaal and arihant. If no, than do it. The same thing your teacher might have told you but you came at Quora because phone mei PUBG khelna aata hei but marks ki baat aaye toh bhagwaan bachalo situation.
